# Readings

Mandatory readings for this week are:

-   Mittiga, R. (2022). Political legitimacy, authoritarianism, and climate change. American Political Science Review, 116(3), 998-1011. \[[Download via ILIAS](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=file_1368446_download&client_id=ILIAS)\]

-   Schweizer, D., Menzner, J. (2023). Worried about climate change and unsatisfied with democracy? Working Paper.

Further readings and materials include:

-   Ross, M. L. (2015). What have we learned about the resource curse?. Annual Review of Political Science, 18, 239-259.

-   Von Stein, J. (2022). Democracy, autocracy, and everything in between: How domestic institutions affect environmental protection. British Journal of Political Science, 52(1), 339-357.
